subject: 10+ Days With No New Information
description_text:
Hello!

I had recently bought the new HS Pro Shifter on December 14th. I've been checking the website, and it still says my order is unfulfilled. I was just curious if this was somehow an error on my part, or maybe there is some problem Iâ€™m not aware of.

My order number is:  #SSN4836

Thank you,
Noah Hogard

conversations.body_text: Hi noah hogard,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELE2434641302YQ
